question: Who can join GlobalYogaSpace?
answer: Anyone interested in yoga and fitness, regardless of experience level.

question: Are the coaches certified?
answer: Yes, all our coaches are certified yoga and fitness professionals.

question: Can I join group classes anytime?
answer: Absolutely. Our group classes are available daily and are open to all students.

question: Can I switch between group and 1-on-1 sessions?
answer: Absolutely! You can mix and match sessions according to your goals.
